sections.title: Stalwart Defender (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Stalwart Defender class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Stalwart Defender)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple and martial weapons, all armor types, and all shields including tower shields.

sections.title: AC Bonus (Ex) (Stalwart Defender)
sections.description: Provides a dodge bonus to AC that starts at +1 and improves to +4 at 10th level.

sections.title: Defensive Stance (Ex) (Stalwart Defender)
sections.description: Allows entering a defensive stance as a free action that provides bonuses to AC, Strength, Constitution, and Will saves but prevents voluntary movement.

sections.title: Defensive Powers (Ex) (Stalwart Defender)
sections.description: Grants special abilities usable only during defensive stance, gained at 2nd level and every two levels thereafter.

sections.title: Uncanny Dodge (Ex) (Stalwart Defender)
sections.description: Prevents being caught flat-footed and retains Dexterity bonus to AC against invisible attackers, but vulnerable to feints.

sections.title: Damage Reduction (Ex) (Stalwart Defender)
sections.description: Grants damage reduction that scales from 1/— at 5th level to 5/— at 10th level, with special stacking rules for armor DR.

sections.title: Improved Uncanny Dodge (Ex) (Stalwart Defender)
sections.description: Prevents flanking and sneak attacks except from rogues at least four levels higher than the stalwart defender.

sections.title: Mobile Defense (Ex) (Stalwart Defender)
sections.description: Allows taking one 5-foot step per round while maintaining defensive stance without losing stance benefits.

sections.title: Last Word (Ex) (Stalwart Defender)
sections.description: Once per day while in defensive stance, allows making a double-damage melee attack when reduced to negative hit points, unconsciousness, or death.
